# items

**Instance Property**

An array containing the menu items in the menu.

## Declaration

```swift
var items: [NSMenuItem] { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property contains an array of menu items in the menu.

## Finding Menu Items

- **item(withTag:)**: Returns the first menu item in the menu with the specified tag.
- **item(withTitle:)**: Returns the first menu item in the menu with a specified title.
- **item(at:)**: Returns the menu item at a specific location of the menu.
- **numberOfItems**: The number of menu items in the menu, including separator items.

items.description: Returns the first menu item in the menu with the specified tag.
items.name: item(withTag:)

items.description: Returns the first menu item in the menu with a specified title.
